55870.affected_area: Port Moody (Heritage Mountain, Eagle Ridge, Dartmoor, Cassin, Cariboo, Ranch Park, & Maillardville)
live_updates: Work to restore services in the area continues. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
55870.summary: Some customers in the Heritage Mountain, Eagle Ridge, Dartmoor, Cassin, Cariboo, Ranch Park, & Maillardville areas of Port Moody are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
55870.title: Dec 6 - Port Moody, Anmore, Coquitlam (Heritage Mountain, Eagle Ridge, Dartmoor, Cassin, Cariboo, Ranch Park, & Maillardville) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
